name: SOS - Submarine of senseless
description:
Your captain has gone mad and drives like a lunatic! Parts are flying, lights are flickering and temperature is rising rapidly. You have 2 minutes time to fix the submarine otherwise you will sink.

Before you can play the game you will need to use game controller to play the the game. Game is local multiplayer and max amount of players in game is 4 players. Try to survive and assembling the submarine that captain is disassembling.

Hope you will enjoy the game. We had really fun while we doing it.
